Text:
-TRANSLATION-

Multi v2.0.0.669 Pinnacle VideoSpin

VideoSpin is the solution presented by Pinnacle to create, within minutes, amazing video montages with your photos, videos and favorite songs.

With VideoSpin can do everything necessary to make a montage home: mix videos, sequence pictures, use different transitions, create titles, add sound effects and background music, all in a very clear and straightforward.

For this, the Pinnacle team has managed to create a workspace as enjoyable. Divide into three zones (album, timeline and display) allows you to upload content, selection and move from one area to another by simply dragging them.

Furthermore, to put it on a plate, VideoSpin includes a brief tutorial to help you squeeze the most value to the program since it first.

Key gene included

Hi, I cant find the key generator with the torrent... help please?
no keygen needed. just copy files from the crack folder to the installed program folder overwriting existing files.

1 Go to ENGiNE/Crack directory.
2 Copy "VideoSpin.exe" into installed folder. default is : C:,Program Files,Pinnacle,VideoSpin,Programs
3 Copy "Pixie.dll" into: shared files,pixie
default is: C:Program Files,Pinnacle,Shared Files,Pixie
No limitations with codecs, no need to register to internet.
does it imports .mpeg files even after the 15 days period ??
U need to buy codecs after 15 days trial...:(
You people who downloaded this need to seed more.
Nope, doesn't work.  After applying the crack correctly, and after fifteen days, I can't split video files or edit them in any way.
The crack doesn't work. After 15 days you can't use some codecs.
Apparently it does work. You just have to copy the file Pixie.dll in the right filder.
